mapper.select: SELECT a.terminal_id, a.uptime, IFNULL(a.carno, c.car_no) car_no FROM (SELECT t.terminal_id, t.carno, t.uptime FROM t_realtime_position t WHERE t.lat >= #{startLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.lat <= #{endLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.lon >= #{startLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.lon <= #{endLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.uptime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{interval,jdbcType=DECIMAL} HOUR) GROUP BY t.terminal_id ) a LEFT JOIN car_info c ON a.terminal_id = c.terminal_id ORDER BY uptime DESC

SELECT a.terminal_id, a.uptime, IFNULL(a.carno, c.car_no) car_no FROM (SELECT t.terminal_id, t.carno, t.uptime FROM t_realtime_position t WHERE (t.lat - #{centerLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) * (t.lat - #{centerLat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) + (t.lon - #{centerLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) * (t.lon - #{centerLong,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) <= #{semidiameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL} * #{semidiameter,jdbcType=DECIMAL} AND t.uptime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{interval,jdbcType=DECIMAL} HOUR) GROUP BY t.terminal_id ) a LEFT JOIN car_info c ON a.terminal_id = c.terminal_id ORDER BY uptime DESC

SELECT a.terminal_id, a.uptime, IFNULL(a.carno, c.car_no) car_no FROM (SELECT t.terminal_id, t.carno, t.uptime FROM t_realtime_position t where MBRContains( ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POLYGON((', #{polygon, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '))')), ST_GeomFromText(CONCAT('POINT(', lon, ' ', lat, ')')) ) > 0 AND t.uptime >= DATE_SUB(NOW(),INTERVAL #{interval,jdbcType=DECIMAL} HOUR) GROUP BY t.terminal_id ) a LEFT JOIN car_info c ON a.terminal_id = c.terminal_id ORDER BY uptime DESC
